document.full_text: five people were killed, including four indiana high school seniors returning from spring break, when a minivan plowed head on into the students' car on a rain-soaked highway in alabama, authorities said on sunday.
document.title: four indiana teens die in crash after spring break
lines_and_colors: five people were killed, including four indiana high school seniors returning from spring break, when a minivan plowed head on into the students' car on a rain-soaked highway in alabama, authorities said on sunday.
